assumptions: Ensure all financial data is up-to-date and accurate.

recommendation.summary: Ensure all financial data is up-to-date and accurate.
recommendation.actions_7d:
- Review Balance Sheet Identity
- Verify Net Income Coherence
- Reconcile Cash Flow
recommendation.actions_30d:
- Update Financial Data
- Analyze Trends
- Prepare for Next Reporting Period
risks: Data inconsistencies may lead to incorrect financial analysis.
recommendation.forecast_note: Ensure all financial data is up-to-date for accurate analysis.
